title: Blogger and JS help - getting content to display in all posts - Upwork
content:
Hoping this is an easy one. We are not allowed to post URLs in the post, so, when we get talking, I can give you the blog URL you can visit to see the issue.

Note that you are highly encouraged to reply with a picture showing that the problem is solved at your end so that it is easy for me to hire you. I am not asking for work to be delivered, just proof that you know how to solve it because you have already solved it. No need to send any code or URL. Just a picture showing that both posts display as expected.

How to see the problem?

The quickest way is to create a test blog on blogspot (aka blogger) with two posts using the given content to see the issue. The theme chosen should be "Awesome Inc.," "Dark"

You will see that only the text (intended to be displayed by JS) is shown.

The goal is to display all intended text in all posts - that are intended to be displayed using JS. You might come up with a solution.

title: Search Engine Optimization Expert & Copywriter - Upwork
content:
Are you a savvy SEO expert with a passion for optimizing websites and driving organic traffic? Surge Avenue is looking for you to join our team as a Search Engine Website Optimization Specialist!

**About Us:**
Surge Avenue is a dynamic real estate marketing agency dedicated to excellence in the industry. As we continue to grow, we recognize the importance of a strong online presence. We're seeking a skilled SEO Specialist to enhance our website’s visibility and drive organic traffic.

**Role and Responsibilities:**
As the Search Engine Website Optimization Specialist, you will:
- Develop and implement effective SEO strategies to improve website rankings on search engines.
- Conduct keyword research to identify high-impact opportunities and optimize content accordingly.
- Perform on-page and off-page optimization, including meta tags, link building, and content improvements.
- Analyze website performance using SEO tools and provide recommendations for enhancements.
- Stay updated with the latest SEO trends, algorithms, and best practices.
- Collaborate with content creators to ensure SEO best practices are integrated into the content.
- Monitor and report on website traffic, rankings, and other SEO metrics.
- Conduct technical SEO audits and resolve issues to improve site health and performance.

**What We Offer:**
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Creative and collaborative work environment.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Access to the latest SEO tools and resources.
- Flexibility to work remotely or in-office as needed.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as an SEO Specialist or similar role, with a strong portfolio of successful SEO projects.
- Proficiency in SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Ahrefs, etc.
- Strong understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking factors.
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to conduct detailed and thorough SEO audits.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills.
- Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and website administration.
- Experience in real estate marketing is a plus.

If you're a passionate SEO expert with a knack for driving organic growth and optimizing website performance, we want to hear from you! Join Surge Avenue and play a crucial role in enhancing our online presence. Apply now with your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you're the perfect fit for this position.

title: Senior Python Developer  - Upwork
content:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Python Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Python development, with a proven track record of building robust and scalable applications. As a Senior Python Developer, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining our core applications, ensuring they meet the highest standards of performance, security, and scalability.

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Design, develop, and maintain complex software applications using Python.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
- Perform code reviews and mentor junior developers to ensure code quality.
- Optimize applications for maximum performance and scalability.
- Troubleshoot and debug issues, providing timely resolutions.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure our applications remain cutting-edge.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as a Senior Python Developer or similar role.
- Strong proficiency in Python, with experience in frameworks such as Django, Flask, or FastAPI.
- Experience with front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.
- Knowledge of databases (SQL and NoSQL), including PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, etc.
- Understanding of software development principles, including Agile methodologies.
- Experience with version control systems, particularly Git.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Strong communication skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
- Familiarity with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).
- Knowledge of DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.
- Experience with machine learning and data analysis libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Pandas) is a plus.
- Contribution to open-source projects or personal projects showcasing your skills.

**Benefits:**
- Competitive compensation based on experience.
- Flexible working hours and remote work options.
- Opportunity to work on challenging and impactful projects.
- Collaborative and supportive team environment.
- Professional development opportunities to enhance your skills.

**How to Apply:**
Please submit your application along with your resume and a portfolio or examples of previous work demonstrating your Python development expertise. In your cover letter, describe your experience with Python, notable projects you have worked on, and why you are a good fit for this role.

We look forward to hearing from talented and passionate developers who are ready to take on exciting challenges and contribute to our innovative projects.

title: chatGPT powered bot, integrated with Facebook Messenger - Upwork
content:
I am seeking a skilled engineer to develop a ChatGPT-powered bot that provides responses to customers asking for help with specific issues. The bot should be accessible via multiple messaging platforms including Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, iMessage & a webUI on my website.The responses the bot provides should come from either the internet or custom-built knowledge bases that can be easily updated by a non-technical person on my team.

Design, develop, and deploy a ChatGPT-powered bot. (front-end and back-end)

Integrate the bot with Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, iMessage & my website for seamless user interactions.

Create custom knowledge bases that can be easily updated to ensure accurate and current responses.

Build features that allow the bot to pull responses from the internet or custom knowledge bases.

Conduct thorough testing to guarantee the bot’s reliability and accuracy.

Provide documentation and support for maintaining and updating the bot.

title: Develop a Service Marketplace Platform Connecting Users with Local Professionals - Upwork
content:
Job Title: Development of a Service Marketplace Platform**

**Description:**

We are seeking an experienced development team to create a comprehensive service marketplace platform. This platform will connect users with local professionals offering a variety of services. The platform should allow users to search for service providers, read reviews, book appointments, and make payments, all within a user-friendly interface.

**Key Features:**

1. **User Accounts:** Registration and profile management for both service providers and customers.
2. **Service Listings:** Allow service providers to create detailed listings of their services, including descriptions, pricing, and photos.
3. **Search and Filtering:** Advanced search functionality with filters based on location, service type, availability, and ratings.
4. **Booking System:** Calendar integration for scheduling appointments, along with real-time availability updates.
5. **Reviews and Ratings:** Users can leave reviews and rate service providers based on their experience.
6. **Payment Integration:** Secure payment processing through major gateways (e.g., Stripe, PayPal).
7. **Notifications:** Email and SMS notifications for booking confirmations, reminders, and other important updates.
8. **Admin Dashboard:** A comprehensive admin panel for managing users, services, transactions, and platform settings.
9. **Responsive Design:** Ensure the platform is fully responsive and optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.
10. **Security:** Implement robust security measures to protect user data and transactions.

**Technical Requirements:**

- **Frontend:** Modern frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
- **Backend:** Technologies like Node.js, Django, or Ruby on Rails.
- **Database:** Use of relational (MySQL, PostgreSQL) or NoSQL (MongoDB) databases.
- **APIs:** Development of RESTful or GraphQL APIs.
- **Hosting:** Deployment on cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure.
- **Version Control:** Use of Git for version control.

**Desired Experience:**

- Proven experience in building service marketplace platforms or similar web applications.
- Strong skills in frontend and backend development.
- Expertise in integrating payment gateways.
- Knowledge of security best practices.
- Excellent communication skills and ability to meet deadlines.

**Application Instructions:**

Please provide examples of similar projects you have completed, along with a brief description of your approach to this project. Include your proposed timeline and cost estimate.

We look forward to working with a talented team to bring this project to life!

title: Web Performance Optimization Specialist - Upwork
content:
We are looking for a Web Performance Optimization Specialist to help us improve the loading speed and performance of our website. Your main responsibility will be to identify and fix performance bottlenecks, such as unminified JavaScript and CSS files, and reduce the number of HTTP requests. The goal is to ensure fast and smooth user experience for our website visitors.

Please find the points the I need to fix below.
-Some Javascript files don't seem to be minified.
-Some CSS files don't seem to be minified.
-The page makes 110 requests. More than 20 requests can result in slow page loading.
-The size of the HTML document is 61 Kb. This is over our recommendation of 50 Kb

Relevant skills:
- Web Performance Optimization
- Minification of JavaScript and CSS files
- Reducing HTTP requests

Size: Small/Straight forward
Duration: 1 week
